title: Mid-Term Examination Schedule
description: The schedule for the upcoming Mid-Term examinations (Classes VI-X) has been released. Please find the detailed timetable on the school website's download section and on the main notice board. Examinations will commence from November 25th, 2023.

title: Mid-Term Examination Schedule
description: The schedule for the upcoming Mid-Term examinations (Classes VI-X) has been released. Please find the detailed timetable on the school website's download section and on the main notice board. Examinations will commence from November 25th, 2023.

title: Annual Sports Day Postponed
description: Due to inclement weather, the Annual Sports Day scheduled for October 28th has been postponed. New dates will be announced shortly. We regret any inconvenience caused.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting Schedule
description: The upcoming Parent-Teacher meeting will be held on November 5th, 2023, from 9:00 AM to 1:00 PM. Please book your slots with the respective class teachers.

title: Science Exhibition Winners Announced
description: Congratulations to all participants and winners of the Inter-House Science Exhibition! The results have been posted on the main school board and prizes will be distributed during the morning assembly on Monday.
